comprehensiveIntent: Puja, your strong foundation in Python, Data Analysis, Financial Modeling, and Risk Management sets a solid stage for mastering Financial Analysis and Forecasting. chapter.details: Use Python libraries like Pandas to import, clean, and organize financial data.

Develop trading models using multiple linear regression and evaluate performance using investment indicators.

chapter.topicName: Stress Testing and Portfolio Risk Optimization

chapter.details: Analyze vast datasets for financial forecasting.

Techniques for cleaning and preparing financial data for analysis.
Methods to normalize data to ensure consistency and accuracy in forecasting models.
Learn the characteristics of time series data and how it differs from other data types.
Concepts of stationarity and techniques like differencing to make time series data stationary.
Learn the components of ARIMA: Autoregression, Differencing, and Moving Average.
Step-by-step guide to implementing ARIMA using the statsmodels library.
Extend ARIMA to handle seasonal data patterns with SARIMA.
Understand the features and advantages of the Prophet model developed by Facebook.
Guide to using the fbprophet library for effective financial forecasting.
Learn about Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks and their application in time series forecasting.
Step-by-step guide to implementing LSTM using TensorFlow or Keras.
Understand Gated Recurrent Units (GRU) and their advantages over LSTM.
Guide to using GRU for forecasting with deep learning frameworks.
Learn how to calculate and interpret MAE for model evaluation.
Understand RMSE and its significance in evaluating forecasting models.
Understand how different variables impact a financial model.
Create different financial scenarios to predict outcomes under various conditions.
Normalize and clean your financial data to ensure it is suitable for modeling.
Choose the appropriate forecasting model based on the characteristics of your data.
Train your model using historical data and validate its performance using metrics like MAE and RMSE.
Use the trained model to make predictions on new data and visualize the results to interpret trends.

course.recommendedPreparation: This course builds upon your existing knowledge in Python, Data Analysis, Financial Modeling
